WorldBuilder

From Peragro Tempus Wiki


WorldBuilder is a world editing application for Crystal Space. It is similar to WorldCraft, UnrealEd, and Quark.

It supports creating and editing meshes, materials, lights, sectors, portals, and more.

Download

Windows Binary

First download TortoiseCVS if you don't have a CVS Client.

Run a CVS checkout using the following settings: 

Protocol: pserver
Machine: ironoak.serverbox.org
User: anonymous
Root: /cvsroot/worldbuilder
Module: wbrelease

Run worldbuilder.exe

Source 

Protocol: pserver
Machine: ironoak.serverbox.org
User: anonymous
Root: /cvsroot/worldbuilder
Module: worldbuilder

or: cvs co -d:pserver:anonymous@ironoak.serverbox.org/cvsroot/worldbuilder worldbuilder
